msbt.message: Alright, this isn't easy to admit, but you beat me fair and square in that game. So here are the fabulous prizes I owe you. Fair play, and let's do it again soon. I need to get even!
Alright, here are the prizes that you won earlier and couldn't carry home with you. Eat them, plant them, do whatever you want— they're all yours! I hope we can play again sometime...
Sure, winning is fun, but it's not quite the same unless you actually get to collect your prize! So here are your winnings from before. Savor them, because next time we play, I'm coming out on top!
